scripts.dev: concurrently "cd teachteam && npm run dev" "cd teachteam-backend && npm run dev" "cd admin && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd teachteam && npm install && cd ../teachteam-backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.build: cd teachteam && npm run build && cd ../teachteam-backend && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd teachteam && npm run start" "cd teachteam-backend && npm run start" "cd admin && npm run start"
